/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day, while cars are driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape. In the distance, mountains can be seen, adding depth and a sense of scale to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant and varied, from the green of the trees and bushes to the blue of the sky and the various colors of the buildings and cars. The image is a beautiful representation of a day in the life of a busy city like Beijing.
